EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Mobile Labs - The Big 4 of Mobile Testing - 2015.02.05.Email - Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Managing the Big 4 of Mobile Testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Managing the Big 4 of Mobile Testing Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We are excited to invite you to our new webinar, Managing the Big 4 of Mobile Testing! In the webinar, Tricentis is teaming up with Mobile Lab’s Dan McFall and special guest speaker, voke Founder and Analyst, Theresa Lanowitz to share strategies on the “Big 4” of mobile testing: devices, apps, security, and automation.
Specifically, we will be discussing how to:
- Identify, manage, and optimize the level of quality risk in mobile environments - Leverage a private mobile device cloud to remotely view and interact with mobile devices and apps for manual and automated mobile testing - Determine how and why to automate your mobile testing
Our “Managing the Big 4 of Mobile Testing” webinar will take place on February 5, 2015, starting at 4:00 p.m. CET.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-mobile-labs-the-big-4-of-mobile-testing-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-mobile-labs-the-big-4-of-mobile-testing-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu Feb 5, 2014 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CET 7:00 a.m. – 8:00 a.m. PST 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EST
Theresa Lanowitz Founder and Analyst voke
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
Dan McFall VP, Mobility Solutions Mobile Labs
